explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of machine learning models for stock price forecasting, comparing them with the proposed SF-Transformer model.
explanations.deep learning: The paper introduces a deep learning approach, the SF-Transformer model, which combines financial theory with advanced deep learning methods.
explanations.neural network: The SF-Transformer model is based on the Transformer architecture, which is a type of neural network.
explanations.long short-term memory: The paper compares the SF-Transformer model with LSTM-based models, highlighting the superiority of the Transformer approach.
explanations.LSTM: LSTM is mentioned as one of the baseline models compared against the proposed SF-Transformer model.
explanations.attention mechanism: The paper describes how the Transformer model leverages its attention mechanism to discern intricate dependencies and capture long-range relationships in time series data.
explanations.Transformer: The paper proposes the SF-Transformer model, which is based on the Transformer architecture, to improve forecasting accuracy in stock index futures prices.
